help-file.title: "SONG OF HARMING"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous/Depends Type of song: Generic/Enchantment
"Song of harming" removes some lifeforce from those in the room not grouped with the singer, the amount dependent on both level and skill. This song has also been known to cause other affects, such as blindness. It is not possible to kill using this song.
